 B2B startups, agencies, and founder\\-led teams that need repeatable outbound without heavy ops.

**What You’ll Work On (Summary)** 




 As a Full Stack Developer Intern at SvaraAI, you’ll get hands\\-on experience building end\\-to\\-end SaaS features across frontend, backend, and integrations.
 



  





 Frontend/Product Development: Implement design systems, authentication flows, campaign builder UI, shared inbox, personalization previews, dashboards, and accessibility improvements using Next.js, React.js, and TailwindCSS.
